title: Rituals Pflege-Geschenkset für Frauen von The Ritual of Ayurveda, Größe L, 4-tlg.
description: Tolle Angebote und Top Qualität entdecken - CO2 neutraler Versand ✔ Kauf auf Rechnung und Raten ✔ Erfülle dir deine Wünsche bei OTTO!
text:
|Inhaltsstoffe||The Ritual of Ayurveda Body: Aqua/Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propylheptyl Caprylate, Undecane, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Hybrid Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Allantoin, Tocopherol, Ubiquinone, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Parfum/Fragrance, Tridecane, Isohexadecane, Cetyl Palmitate, Ceteareth-20, Glyceryl Stearate, Propylene Glycol, Carbomer, Sodium Polyacrylate, Ceteareth-12, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Benzoate, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Coumarin, Citronellol, Benzyl Benzoate, Geraniol, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Citral, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid.The Ritual of Ayurveda Foaming Shower Gel: Aqua/Water, Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Decyl Glucoside, Isopentane, Coco-Glucoside, Glycerin, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Parfum/Fragrance, Isobutane, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Coumarin, Citronellol, Benzyl Benzoate.The Ritual of Ayurveda Hair & Body Mist: Aqua/Water, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Trideceth-9, Parfum/Fragrance, Sodium Benzoate, Propylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Seed Extract, Glycerin, Sorbic Acid, Citric Acid, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Cinnamate, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.The Ritual of Ayurveda Hand Balm: Aqua/Water, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Undecane, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tridecane, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Anisate, Phytic Acid, Glyceryl Caprylate, Xanthan Gum, Parfum/Fragrance, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Limonene, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Sorbic Acid, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide|
